template.name: Zone preset schedule template
template.description: Template for scheduling presets on a presence or time basis with the option to override the preset's setpoint/state.

template.name: Relay schedule template
template.description: Template for scheduling relays on a time, solar time, preset, temperature and humidity basis.

appliance.name: Gateway
appliance.description: Container for variables logged about the Gateway in general.

location.name: Living room
location.description: The room containing the (central) home thermostat.

template.name: Relay schedule template
template.description: Template for scheduling relays on a time basis.

template.name: Relay schedule template
template.description: Template for scheduling relays on a time and preset basis.

template.name: Zone preset template
template.description: Template for actuating thermostats and relays on a preset basis.

template.name: Client, Pointlog presence template
template.description: Template for setting default client presence based on point_logs

template.name: Electricity action trigger template
template.description: Template for triggering actions based on time and electricity production or consumption.
